title: A mesoporous Ta2O5/Nb2O5 nanocomposite with Lewis/Brønsted acid sites to enhance stepwise glucose conversion to 5-hydroxymethylfurfural
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2219-2234
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00228H, Paper
Sangeeta Mahala, Senthil Murugan Arumugam, Ravi Kumar Kunchala, Bhawana Devi, Sasikumar Elumalai
The Ta2O5/Nb2O5 composite enables a systematic glucose conversion to HMF via fructose intermediate formation with selectivity attributed to the provision of Lewis and Brønsted acidic sites.
